title: clearlag怎么关掉清理命名牌生物
author: 传说搞笑
txt_content: clearlag怎么关掉清理命名牌生物，我服务器空岛，玩家抱怨，config.yml全是英文，我文盲:(

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
Rinbin
replies.txt_content: 这个插件做不到，需要就去定制吧

replies.author: 传说搞笑
replies.txt_content: clearlag有清理怪的功能，他同时也会清理命名过的生物，就是不知道在哪里关掉

replies.author: 龙丿逆-霸
replies.txt_content:
这个好说
# - cow <- This mob-type will be REMOVED during removal!
  # - MINECART_MOB_SPAWNER
  # - Pig liveTime=100 <- This mob will be REMOVED if it's been alive for 100 ticks (5 seconds)
  # - Minecart !isMounted <- This entity will be REMOVED if it's NOT mounted
  # - Wolf !hasName <- This entity will be REMOVED if it doesn't have a name
最后一条的意思就是，只清理不带名字的，带名字的不清理
